00037 integer::integer() {
00038     _init();
00039 }
00040 
00042 integer::integer(const integer& b) {
00043     if (!b.is_nan()) _init(b);
00044 }
00045 
00056 integer::integer(const core::integer& b) {
00057     _attach(b);
00058 }
00059 
00061 integer::integer(const std::string& str, size_t base) {
00062     try {
00063         _init(from_string(str, base));
00064     } catch (std::exception&) {
00065         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00066     }
00067 }

00073 bool integer::odd() const {
00074     if (is_nan()) {
00075         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw not_a_number();
00076         else return false;
00077     }
00078     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==1);
00079 }
00080 
00085 bool integer::even() const {
00086     if (is_nan()) {
00087         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw not_a_number();
00088         else return false;
00089     }
00090     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==0);
00091 }
00092 
00097 int integer::sign() const {
00098     if (is_nan()) {
00099         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw not_a_number();
00100         else return 0;
00101     }
00102     if (_get_length()==1 && _get_digit(0)==0) return 0;
00103     return (_get_data()->mIsNegative ? -1 : 1);
00104 }

00110 size_t integer::hex_digits() const {
00111     try {
00112         return core::integer(*this).hex_digits();
00113     } catch (std::exception&) {
00114         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00115         else return 0;
00116     }
00117 }

00125 bool integer::is_nan() const {
00126     return (_get_data()==0);
00127 }

00129 integer& integer::operator+=(const integer& addend) {
00130     try {
00131         *this=integer(core::integer(*this).operator+=(core::integer(addend)));
00132     } catch (std::exception&) {
00133         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00134         *this=integer::nan();
00135     }
00136     return *this;
00137 }

00149 integer& integer::operator=(const integer &c) {
00150     try {
00151         _attach(c);
00152     } catch (std::exception&) {
00153         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00154         _attach(0);
00155     }
00156     return *this;
00157 }

00159 integer& integer::operator*=(const integer& b) { *this=multiply(*this, b); return *this; }
00160 integer& integer::operator/=(const integer& b) { *this=divide(*this, b); return *this; }
00161 integer& integer::operator%=(const integer& b) { *this=mod(*this, b); return *this; }

00163 integer& integer::operator++() { *this += one(); return *this; }
00164 integer& integer::operator--() { *this -= one(); return *this; }
00165 integer  integer::operator++(int) { integer s=*this; *this += one(); return s; }
00166 integer  integer::operator--(int) { integer s=*this; *this -= one(); return s; }

00168 integer  integer::operator<<(size_t shift) const { return shift_left(*this, shift); }
00169 integer  integer::operator>>(size_t shift) const { return shift_right(*this, shift); }
00170 integer& integer::operator&=(const integer& n) { *this=bitwise_and(*this, n); return *this; }
00171 integer& integer::operator|=(const integer& n) { *this=bitwise_or(*this, n); return *this; }
00172 integer& integer::operator^=(const integer& n) { *this=bitwise_xor(*this, n); return *this; }

00194 const integer& integer::zero() {
00195     if (cZero.get()==0) cZero.reset(new integer(core::integer::zero()));
00196     return *cZero;
00197 }
00198 
00199 const integer& integer::one() {
00200     if (cOne.get()==0) cOne.reset(new integer(core::integer::one()));
00201     return *cOne;
00202 }
00203 
00204 const integer& integer::nan() {
00205     if (cNaN.get()==0) {
00206         integer *n=new integer();
00207         n->_attach(0);
00208         cNaN.reset(n);
00209     }
00210     return *cNaN;
00211 }

00213 void integer::_init(detail::digit_t init) {
00214     try {
00215         _attach(new detail::data_t(init));
00216     } catch (std::exception&) {
00217         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00218     }
00219 }

00221 void integer::_init(const integer &c) {
00222     try {
00223         _attach(c);
00224     } catch (std::exception&) {
00225         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00226     }
00227 }

00229 void integer::_init(boost::uintmax_t n) {
00230     try {
00231         _attach(new detail::data_t(n));
00232     } catch (std::exception&) {
00233         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00234     }
00235 }

00237 void integer::_make_unique() {
00238     if (!_is_unique()) {
00239         try {
00240             _attach(new detail::data_t(_get_data()));
00241         } catch (std::exception&) {
00242             if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00243             _attach(0); // Turns it into a Not-a-Number,
00244         }
00245     }
00246 }
00247 
00248 void integer::_set_negative(bool negative) {
00249     if (_get_data()->mIsNegative != negative) {
00250         _make_unique();
00251         detail::data_t *p=_get_data();
00252         p->mIsNegative=negative;
00253         p->skipLeadingZeros();
00254     }
00255 }
